string.name: help_body
string.b:
Welcome to our help page and thank you for using our UNM campus locator app. For a better experience using our map routing functionality, please enable GPS on your device. It is also recommended that you are to be near UNM main campus while using this app. If you have any questions or are experiencing technical issues with the app, feel free to contact us at 
 ece.419.seniordesign@gmail.com. 
 
 Thank you,
 ECE Senior Design Group 
 Marcos Archuleta 
 Joseph Hilland 
 Shannon Gallagher 
 Thomas Lewis 
 Brett Hayes
